Nightstrike:

Nightstrike shouted anger at Synphony "COME ON, YOU LITTLE-BOT... IF 
YOU WANT TO BE A WARRIOR YOU SHOULD SHOT AGAINST ALL YOUR ENEMIES!!!!"

After that he fired two missiles agaisnt LAvatron

> OOC: That's okay, yah dont need to say sorry.

> Wildrider noticed the apprehension in Symphony, but he didn't care. 
He

spread
